<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Hymn of Healing](/Spells.aspx?ID=728)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** you or 1 ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 4 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

Your divine singing mends wounds and provides a temporary respite from harm. The target gains fast healing 2. When you Cast the Spell and the first time each round you Sustain the Spell, the target gains 2 temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 round.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The fast healing and temporary Hit Points each increase by 2.
name: Hymn of Healing
